features: REPLACES TRADITIONAL DETERGENT : Spot's concentrated, all natural laundry detergent sheets will clean your clothes and keep them smelling fresh! Spot works in all washing machines, HE and non-HE models, including laundromat washers. Just add a pre-measured, liquidless sheet to the washer with your clothes inside and turn it on using your normal washer settings. Simply put, Spot Detergent Sheets are more convenient and easier to use. Not to mention, no more spilling laundry detergent.

LAUNDRY FOR THE 21ST CENTURY : Spot Detergent Sheets brings convenience to washing with plastic-free packaging. Just grab a pre-measured sheet, throw it in the washer and you are set! Our quick dissolve technology works in all water temperatures, delivering a full, deep clean every time. The pre-measured dose in our Detergent Sheets knocks out the toughest stains and removes dirt from any article of clothing, linens, blankets and everything in between.

POWERFUL CLEANING : Spot's all natural, plant-based formula delivers the ultimate clean. Our product is made in Sweden and is paraben and 1-dioxane free. Our product is dermatologist tested and approved to be the best laundry detergent sheets for sensitive skin.

ECO-FRIENDLY ON A BUDGET : Spot believes in letting everyone make the environmentally friendly choice, so we don't overcharge for our product. We know that for every pack of eco-friendly sheets that we sell, that's one less plastic jug of laundry detergent that ends up in a landfill. Our ultimate goal is to drastically reduce the plastic waste in our world, so we're putting the environment first and profit second. Our eco sheets are the free and clear, eco-friendly choice!

LESS SPACE, GREAT FOR TRAVEL : Our space-saving washing sheets fit in tight spaces, saving you valuable space in your home. Perfect for apartments and houses with a small laundry room. Laundry detergent strips takes up next to no room in your luggage. You don't even need a washing machine, just a basin or sink. Add your clothes and a pre-measured sheet and agitate the water for a few minutes. Then hang your clothes to dry. Laundry detergent sheets travel well, no matter how far you're going.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great idea!
reviews.reviewText: I love how this is going to change doing laundry on every level…and help the environment and planet…just by a simple change. I have used these twice now and am very impressed. The ease of use…just throw a sheet in. The fresh scent is subtle. You use a full sheet for a large load..and 1/2 sheet for a small or medium load. Clothes come out clean and fresh. Price point is excellent as well. No more luging big plastic jugs of detergent home😁 I will be switching over to this exclusively once I use up my current detergent. I heartily recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only thing to help my dematitis in many years and brands
reviews.reviewText: Ease of use and low to non scented are my favorite reasons to continue use. less messy than liquid or evn powder. Half a sheet is all I use unless very grimy laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and saves the environment
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well and smells good. Don’t pay for water or plastic jugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact that these sheets are easy to use, but I would like a little bit more of a scent which fades as soon as the sheets get wet. Overall, they clean well, but I do bigger loads, so it took me a while to figure out how many sheets to use and now they are all gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Getting clothes clean and smell good
reviews.reviewText: Liked scent, portability(great for packing in a suitcase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I'm enjoying this product, first time I've ordered it. I like the easy, economy and ecological benefits of using sheets instead of liquid coming from plastic or all the plastic in pods. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I seriously love this product. I didn’t even know that detergent sheets existed. These smell amazing !! The process of using these is so simple and convenient. I honestly wish I knew about these before but now I will continue purchasing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Hacen jabón y dejan la ropa limpia como con cualquier jabón tradicional. La fragancia es floral, muy agradable y es muy práctico usarlas
Magnífico producto, me ahorrará dinero y evitará usar cualquier plástico de envases
